name: bourride
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of soup made with fish, vegetables, and white wine: Aioli (garlic mayonnaise) is an essential accompaniment to bourride. A bourride is like a fish soup and usually made with a variety of fish.
More examplesFewer examplesThe thing that I love about bourride is not just the fish, but also the clever use of aioli as a thickener.A smartly-put-together bourride of bream, squid, and mussels comes with creamy rouille.A cousin of bouillabaisse is bourride, another authentic fish soup from the Mediterranean.
